bwwExcerpt: Hargrove has a long career in writing television and it shows -- his writing is commendably spare, characters are clearly and clever drawn, he writes with visuals in mind as well as story and character, and there are a lot of quick scene changes. The lyrics...are really excellent, witty and rueful as occasion demands.
